name: hue-logger
description: Elevate your console logging experience with this vibrant and feature-rich logger. Enjoy a burst of color and style as your messages and errors come to life in the console. This logger not only provides a visually appealing display but also ensures a clear and easy-to-read format for your messages. Whether it's an important notification or a critical error, this logger transforms your console output into an aesthetically pleasing and functionally efficient showcase. Upgrade your debugging and messaging with a touch of elegance â€“ because every log deserves a great look
author: susikumar_pitchaimuthu
